title: Junior Bookkeeper
job_overview:
Tasks:

Maintain financial records, including purchases, sales, receipts, and payments.
Manage invoice processing and accounts payable/receivable.
Assist in the preparation of monthly financial reports.
Reconcile bank statements and other financial accounts.
Process payroll and maintain payroll information.
Ensure compliance with financial regulations and company policies.
Work with QuickBooks accounting software to record and analyze financial data.
Collaborate with other teaUpgrade to see actual infombers to streamline accounting processes.
Provide support during financial audits.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
Proven experience in bookkeeping or a related financial role - minimum 2-3 years Experience
Proficiency in QuickBooks accounting software - minimum 1 year Experience
Strong knowledge of bookkeeping practices and principles.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office, especially Excel.
Detail-oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
Knowledge of payroll processing and financial regulations.
Capacity to handle sensitive financial information discreetly and ethically.
Demonstrated ability to manage tasks independently, showcasing responsibility and initiative.

Hourly rate, based on experience
Night Shift - New York Time
Work From Home / Home-based: High-Speed Internet Connection w/ back up and a Desktop or Laptop computer with great specs is A MUST!
